name: Room Escape:Escape the secret rooms
description:
Escape the secrets: escape the secret apartment
      Is a room-themed puzzle game, one day you are attacked on the way to get off work, when you wake up and find yourself in a room where the secret organs are everywhere, you need to find a variety of clues can get The key opened the door to leave.
       There are multiple rooms in the game that can be switched, the game puzzle is rich and cleverly designed. As a loyal chamber player you, how can not try it, hurry to challenge it!
